scenes.background: Monica agrees to find a quieter spot. Bob chimes in with a cautious tone.
scenes.description: 'But what if we end up splitting the group?'

options.text: If we communicate well, we can make sure everyone stays together.
options.analysis: You showed empathy and self-regulation by considering everyone's cohesion, but social skill and perception were moderate.

options.text: Maybe splitting up isn't a bad idea if it means everyone enjoys themselves.
options.analysis: You suggested an alternative calmly, showing good empathy and motivation, but social skill and perception were lower.

options.text: Let's plan an activity that ensures we stay together.
options.analysis: You acknowledged the concern and suggested a unifying activity, showing good perception and social skills, but empathy and self-regulation were moderate.
